title: vEnkaTaramaNa vEdAnta
sahitya:
vEnkaTaramaNa vEdAnta ninnaya pAda pankaja kaNDa mEle 
manku mAnavara bEDisuvuducive shanka cakrAnkitane


caraNam 1    kSIra sAgarava pondidava madisida nIru majjige kANane cAru 
kalpavrkSadaTiyalli kuLitavage dore tintriNi bayakeya
    caraNam 2    sArva bhUpAlana sUnu enisidavage sure kULina tiruke nAri 
lakSmIkAnta ninna pondidavage dAridryadaTTULiya
    caraNam 3    sura nadiyali mindu shuciyAda mElinnu duritagaLaTTuLiye 
parama puruSa ninna pondiirda dAsarge arigaLa bhItiyuNTe
    caraNam 4    garuDana mantrava kalidu japisuvage uragana hAvaLiye 
hari pakkadoLu mane kaTTda naranige karigaLa bhItiyunTe
    caraNam 5    parama puruSa guNa pUrNa nInahudendu marehokke kAyo enna 
uragAdrivAsa shrI purandara viTTala parabrahma nArAyaNa
